description: This Cryptonite web site shows cryptocurrency information & real time prices report based on CoinGecko & CryptoCompare APIs. Comparison of cryptocurrencies prices shown in real-time report of cryptocurrencies and finding symbol of specific cryptocurrency gives user an easy way to find valuable information.
designApproach: This site was designed in "Mobile first" design approach.
technologies: Technologies: HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, OO JavaScript, ES6 Modules, jQuery, CanvasJS.
tools: Tools I used: VS Code, Git, GitHub.
createdBy: Created by Raya Levinson - Full Stack Web Developer
